events.name: CartItemsSorted
events.description: Allows customers to organize items in the cart for easier browsing.

events.name: CartDiscountApplied
events.description: Facilitates promotional discounts applied to items in the cart.

events.name: CartAbandoned
events.description: Tracks when a cart is left without completing the purchase.

events.name: CartSavedForLater
events.description: Allows customers to save items for future purchase.

commands.name: Sort
commands.description: Allows customers to organize items in the cart for easier browsing.

commands.name: ApplyDiscount
commands.description: Facilitates promotional discounts applied to items in the cart.

commands.name: Abandon
commands.description: Tracks when a cart is left without completing the purchase.

commands.name: SaveForLater
commands.description: Allows customers to save items for future purchase.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with inventory to check item availability before finalizing the cart.

integrationPoints.name: PaymentGateway
integrationPoints.description: Ensures seamless payment processing for the items in the cart.

integrationPoints.name: UserProfile
integrationPoints.description: Links the shopping cart data with user account for personalized experiences.
